column5: Description

column4: Send emails—without having to write them
column5: Your assistant crafts emails, accelerating your task completion.
Your assistant categorizes emails, freeing you to focus on what matters.
Your assistant manages travel, stays, and activities, ensuring a seamless experience.
Your assistant manages end-to-end travel logistics, addressing transportation, accommodation, and productivity. They swiftly handle any disruptions.

column4: Rebuild your calendar for the life you want to live
column5: Your EA will structure your time around your personal non-negotiables. My EA Sam understands my goals, and drafts my schedule accordingly every week, holding me accountable to my ideal self.
Your assistant will compile detailed profiles for all meeting attendees, ensuring you understand their backgrounds and preferences to communicate effectively.
Your assistant anticipates renewal needs, facilitating continuous travel and sparing you the errand.
Your assistant develops your style profile for personalized, seasonal wardrobe enhancements.

column4: Set a new standard for home cleanliness
column5: Empower your assistant to detail your cleaning standards to providers for consistent home cleanliness.
Your assistant will maintain a tracker to follow current data on your investments and overall portfolio performance.
Your assistant streamlines your online shopping and handles returns, optimizing your time.
Your assistant oversees property maintenance, ensuring consistent quality and freeing your time.
Your assistant prepares an action manual of trusted providers for efficient home system repairs.
Partner with your assistant for a systematic email campaign, enhancing your recruitment reach.
Your assistant will consolidate contacts from multiple platforms into one definitive directory.
Your assistant swiftly filters and forwards top applicants, streamlining your hiring process.
Your assistant analyzes your culinary habits to introduce recipes that enhance your skills and excite your palate.
Your assistant oversees your kitchen inventory, ensuring seamless restocking of your essentials.

column4: Book a table at new restaurants
column5: Your assistant will identify top new eateries, managing reservations, organizing transport, and coordinating line-waiting services as required.
Your EA will translate your culinary preferences into a series of recommendations for meal kit providers, and can even choose the menu items you’ll receive based on your family’s specific tastes.
Your assistant assesses your preferences to tailor book and podcast recommendations, supplementing with insights from your personal network for a bespoke selection.
Grant your assistant access to your streaming services; they'll curate fresh artist recommendations for your listening pleasure.
Your assistant will instill the habits needed for workout success and secure daily time for effective exercise, at the gym, with a trainer, or at home.
Your assistant ensures a consistent supply of your necessary prescriptions without interruption.
Your assistant becomes your dietary accountability partner, ensuring progress.
Your assistant schedules healthcare visits, alerts you to overdue check-ups, assists in provider selection, and compiles your health records for easy access.
Your assistant compiles a comprehensive health inventory for efficient provider consultation.
My assistant sourced a machine learning PhD to establish a Telegram tutoring channel for myself and five entrepreneurs, providing direct access to expert guidance without the need for formal classes.

My assistant conducts daily goal progress check-ins via WhatsApp and provides a weekly performance summary. This delegation strategy has proven highly effective, especially when paired with a colleague or friend.
Your assistant connects you with a top tutor to refine your language skills for confident communication.
I worked with my assistant to create personalized albums for anyone I want, with little more than a voice note. Here’s how it works.
Your assistant creates and sends custom postcards from your photos, mimicking your handwriting for a personal touch.

Your most trusted EA—you will need more than one for this to work—becomes an extra set of eyes and ears during their shift, observing your little one’s crib and letting you sleep through most routine wake-ups, only alerting you when it’s urgent.
Your assistant creates a tailored calendar highlighting key dates and manages celebratory gestures on your behalf. Sends reminders and coordinates gift or greeting deliveries, minimizing your effort.
Your assistant orchestrates standout dates, handling every detail for any occasion.
